title: Speeding Over 1-14 Over The Posted Speed Limit
details: An individual who exceeds the speed limit by no more than 14 mph

title: Speeding Over 15-19 Over The Posted Speed Limit
details: An individual who exceeds the speed limit by no less than 15 mph and no more than 19 mph

title: Speeding Over 20-25 Over The Posted Speed Limit
details: An individual who exceeds the speed limit by no less than 20 mph and no more than 25 mph

title: Speeding Over 26-34 Over The Posted Speed Limit
details: An individual who exceeds the speed limit by no less than 26 mph and no more than 34 mph

title: Speeding 35+ Over Posted Speed Limit
details: An individual who exceeds the speed limit by no less than 35 mph

title: Failure To Yield
details: An individual who fails to adhere to a traffic control devices or move out the way upon the imediate approach of an authorized emergency vehicle making use of audible and visual signals

title: Recklless Driving
details: An individual who drives any vehicle with a wilful or wanton disregard for the safety of persons or property

title: Motor Vehicle Contest
details: An individual who drives any vehcile with intent to race a driver of another motor vehicle

title: Improper Lane Usage
details: An individual who drives any vehicle in the left lane wherin he or she crosses a double (non-dotted) line going into oncoming lanes of traffic or fails to maintain a single lane

title: Driving Without A Valid License
details: A individual who is in operation of a motor vehicle on a highway or public roadway while not carrying a valid license

title: Driving While License Suspended/Revoked
details: An individual who operates a motor vehicle while their license is Suspended/Revoked

title: Driving Uder The Influence
details: An individual who operates a motor vehicle while they are under the influence of alcohol or any drig/narcotic that would impair his/her own driving

title: Vehicle Registration
details: An individual who operates a motor vehicle without the adequete registration for said vehicle

title: Vehicle Insurance
details: An individual who operates a motor vehicle without the adequete insurance for said vehicle

title: Following Distance
details: An individual shall not follow another vehicle more closely than is reasonable, having regard for the speed of said vehicle and the traffic upon, and the condition of the roadway
